Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Layer

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class models a shape and can be extended to model more specific types of shapes.
    Version:
    Last edited 10/1/17
    Author:
    Rebecca Refaee

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shape() 
      Shape(double x, double y)
      Creates a Shape at the point (x, y) with a 1-pixel wide black outline

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Draws this Shape on the screen with the dimensions and location specified before
      double getX()
      Returns the x-coordinate of the Shape
      double getY()
      Returns the y-coordinate of the Shape
      abstract boolean isPointInside(double x, double y)
      Determines whether the point (x, y) is contained inside this Shape
      void move(double x, double y)
      Translates the Shape to (x, y)
      void moveBy(double x, double y)
      Adds x to the x-coordinate of the Shape and y to the y-coordinate, moving the Shape x units horizontally and y units vertically
      void setOutlineWidth(int w)
      Sets the width of the outline of the Shape to the int passed in

      Sets the color of the outline of the Shape to the Color passed in

      • Shape

        public Shape(double x,
             double y)
        Creates a Shape at the point (x, y) with a 1-pixel wide black outline
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the point the Shape is based off of
        y - The y-coordinate of the point the Shape is based off of

    • Method Detail

      • isPointInside

        public abstract boolean isPointInside(double x,
                                      double y)
        Determines whether the point (x, y) is contained inside this Shape
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the point being tested
        y - The y-coordinate of the point being tested
        Returns:
        True if the point is inside the Shape; false otherwise

      • setStrokeColor

        public void setStrokeColor(java.awt.Color c)
        Sets the color of the outline of the Shape to the Color passed in
        Parameters:
        c - The Color the stroke will be set to

      • setOutlineWidth

        public void setOutlineWidth(int w)
        Sets the width of the outline of the Shape to the int passed in
        Parameters:
        w - This number is used as the pixel width of the stroke
